alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:13PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Custer and central Rosebud Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 813 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles northwest of Volborg, or 27 miles south of Miles City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosebud, Hathaway, Garland, Moon Creek Ranch, Cartersville and Twelve Mile Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
